name: Heroes of the Ancients
tagline: Heroes of the Storm DotA 2 Mod
body: # Heroes of the Ancients ### Heroes of the Ancients is an upcoming Dota 2 mod, trying to bring the best ideas from Heroes of the Storm™ from Blizzard Entertainment™ to Valves Dota 2™! Heroes of the Ancients is a team massive online battle arena. All teamplayer share the same level and its all about choosing the right abilities for each different map, making every fight unique. Fight together to capture Mercenary Camps, Watch Towers and face epic Dynamic Event Bosses to gain new allies and destroy the enemies ancient! ## When will it be released? When it's ready :) I started development in November 2015, and work since a few weeks all the time constantly on the mod. ### Authors and Contributors Eduard Gotwig (@gotwig) ### Discussion If you like to discuss about the game and want to know about the latest updates, why not [Join our Facebook Group](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/)?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
